scenarios.title: Stealth Breach (Undetected)
scenarios.summary: Detected abnormal lateral movement and suppressed alerts. No user flagged it.
scenarios.impact: Full system compromise. Data leak via S3 sync. No alerts acknowledged.

scenarios.title: Preventable Ransomware Breach
scenarios.summary: Unpatched server allowed RDP entry. Ransomware encrypted core databases.
scenarios.impact: Business halt. Payment demanded. Root cause: no EDR, no MFA, weak IAM.
